price: Their only grievance against them was that they believed in Allah, the All-Mighty, the Praiseworthy,
arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
